amendment.description: To ensure proper education, training, and supervision of personnel providing special education services for dependents of members of the Armed Forces under extended benefits under TRICARE.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4434 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4434 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6383) To ensure proper education, training, and supervision of personnel providing special education services for dependents of members of the Armed Forces under extended benefits under TRICARE.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4434 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4434 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain.
